Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 96-121.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the date that section 601 of the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America becomes effective.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America to stipulate that United States income tax laws will not come into force in the Northern Mariana Islands as a local territorial income tax until January 1, 1982.

titles.title: A bill to amend the date that section 601 of the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America becomes effective.
